title: Factory is building Droids for software engineering with Claude \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Factory is building Droids for software engineering with Claude \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Factory uses Claude to power autonomous droids that streamline software development for enterprises, saving customers over 500,000 engineering hours and millions of dollars across each step of the software development lifecycle.
